    • setState

      public void setState​(int newState)
      Description copied from interface: GameInterface
      Changes the state of the state machine \n(1) Initial menu. (2) Load the game. (3) Exit. (4) Restart the game. (5) Cleans old game and goes to main menu.
      Specified by:
      setState in interface GameInterface
      Parameters:
      newState - State to change in to.

      Description copied from interface: GameInterface
